message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Its value is undeniable, and I believe it aligns perfectly with your needs.  Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,800,000.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, your offer doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,650,000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to get the best price for the product, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go a bit higher and offer $1,550,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I need you to understand the significant value this product represents.  I'm willing to accept $1,600,000, but this is my absolute bottom line.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the cost. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,580,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
